ComicInfo.Summary:
In a sort-of Purgatory on Earth, a con-man convinces Satan to let him fight in the arena for a chance at an easy job in Hell, arguing that he can be a valuable asset to Satan's cause. He picks a skinny victim but his plan backfires when his opponent becomes a fierce werewolf under the full moon.
Satan is stymied when his sacrificial victim's faith is armor against his evil.
A greedy treasure hunter runs afoul of a witch doctor.
